markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Game Master (GM)](/Rules.aspx?ID=27)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 12 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
The Game Master is the player who adjudicates the rules and narrates the various elements of the Pathfinder story and world that the other players explore.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Game Master (GM)
